overview: "Macho Man" Randy Savage faces Sting in a No Disqualification Match for the WCW World Heavyweight Championship. Hollywood Hogan & Kevin Nash take on "Rowdy" Roddy Piper & The Giant in a Baseball Bat on a Pole Match. Raven takes on "Diamond" Dallas Page in a Raven's Rules Match with the WCW United States Championship up for grabs and much more!
tagline: The Biggest. The Baddest. No Bull.
title: WCW Spring Stampede 1998
